title: Resurrection
brief_description: Based on Leo Tolstoy’s novel this is a story of seduction and abandonment, guilt and redemption. Cast includes Arthur V. Johnson, Florence Lawrence, Marion Leonard, Owen Moore, Mack Sennett. Silent film with no intertitles.
